import React, {useState} from 'react' import { FaSun, FaMoon, FaInstagram, FaGithub, FaLinkedin ,FaBars, FaDownload, FaYoutube} from 'react-icons/fa' import { useMediaQuery } from '@chakra-ui/media-query'; import { Box, Flex, Heading, Text, Circle, Stack } from '@chakra-ui/layout'; import Icon from '@chakra-ui/icon'; import { DiCodeigniter, DiAndroid, DiWebplatform,DiReact} from 'react-icons/di' import { ImEarth } from "react-icons/im"; import { useColorMode } from '@chakra-ui/color-mode' import Terminal, { ColorMode, LineType } from 'react-terminal-ui'; import Typewriter from 'typewriter-effect' const About = () => { const [terminalLineData, setTerminalLineData] = useState([ {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Welcome to my Arena'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'My name is Sanchay Sethi'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'I am in currently 3nd year of Engineering'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Obviously my work of domain is computer science'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: ''}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Failed to compile.üòõ'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: './src/components/About.'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Tip Error : '}, {type: LineType.Input, value: { typewriter.pauseFor(600) .typeString('Dont ask any engineer to hack facebook üòÜ') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I had a joke about variables but sadly I can‚Äôt remember it.') .pauseFor(600) .deleteAll() .typeString('Designer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I have a CS joke but it doesn‚Äôt compute.') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I have a joke about recursion, but I have a joke about recursion,...^c^c^c') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('An SQL query goes into a bar, walks up to two tables and asks, ‚ÄúCan I join you?‚Äù') .pauseFor(2000) .start(); }} />}, {type: LineType.Output, value: ''}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Ok! Back to Introduction'}, {type: LineType.Input, value: { typewriter.pauseFor(4000) .typeString('Amma Full Stack Developer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('My Domain of interest is Web Development') .pauseFor(600) .deleteAll() .typeString('Designer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I too like to make Apps') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('I have some apps float on playstore Do check it out') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Havent checked yet!') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Offcourse how do you check! No link has given') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('App name : Sanmeets on playstore') .pauseFor(2000) .start(); }} />}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'I have a strong hand in advance CSS/Javascript'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'I love to play with React renderers DOM'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Compiled with warnings'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'src/App.js'}, {type: LineType.Output, value: 'Type any warning below if you want just for time passüòÜ'}, ]); const { colorMode } = useColorMode(); const isDark = colorMode === "dark"; const [isNotSmallerScreen] = useMediaQuery("(min-width:600px)"); return ( console.log(`New terminal input received: '${ terminalInput }'`) }/> Hiüëã, I'm Sanchay Sethi { typewriter.pauseFor(600) .typeString('Full Stack Developer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Web Developer') .pauseFor(600) .deleteChars(9) .typeString('Designer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('App Developer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('UI/UX Designer') .pauseFor(2000) .deleteAll() .typeString('Freelancer') .pauseFor(2000) .start(); }} /> Expert at - Flutter, React Native, Firebase. Founder of Google & Amazon.
Building @Modulewrapper, Freelancer & Entrepreneur üó£ ) } export default About
